data.name: Vanildo's Journey Fan Pack
data.detailed_description:
A Jornada de Vanildo Fan Pack is an additional content pack that contains many graphics and audio features, made especially for fans of the game! The pack also contains additional information on the story and characters of Vanildo's Journey!

The fan pack is a way to collaborate with the developer, so whoever is satisfied with the game experience and wants to contribute with the creation of new stories can purchase the pack, thus, it will help the developer, being a way to maintain the price of the game accessible and sustainable.

Accessing the Fan Pack:
After purchasing and downloading the Vanildo's Journey Fan Pack, go into Vanildo's Journey Properties and find the "Browse Local Files" button. This will take you to the Vanildo's Journey game directory, which has the Fan Pack included in it.
After accessing the folder entitled "A Jornada de Vanildo fan pack", you will be able to view all the content of the DLC! It is highly recommended to read the "SPOILER ALERT" file.

We strongly recommend that you DO NOT view this pack if you haven't finished the main game yet, as it contains numerous spoilers that will surely harm your final experience.

It is recommended to view the contents of this pack only after completing the game!

data.short_description: A Jornada de Vanildo Fan Pack is an Additional Content pack that contains many graphics and audio features, made especially for fans of the game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers

data.legal_notice: The contents of this package are copyrighted and must not be redistributed or used commercially in any way.

subs.option_text: A Jornada de Vanildo Fan Pack - 169₴ 109₴

content_descriptors.notes: The game has a humorous aspect, where sensitive content is addressed. There is also foul language, veiled nudity, and sexual innuendo.
